text: Rafał Sylwester Wiechecki (born September 25, 1978 in Piotrków Trybunalski) is a Polish politician. He is member of the League of Polish Families. From May 5, 2006 to August 13, 2007, he was the minister of Polish government. He was the youngest cabinet minister in Polish history. == Other websites == * Rafał Wiechecki Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Polish politicians
title: Rafał Wiechecki
